name: 48Seconds
description:
In 48Seconds we take a look at Special Agent Hector . He has been given a mission to destroy a bomb at a old dark factory  and he has 48seconds to do so.

Also watch for enemy bots and trap mines. hectors has to shoot the bomb at the top floor so as to complete the mission.

Note this game is a night time based game you have to watch out for enemies and traps.

How to Play

Use the W , A , D keys to move left , right and upward

Left mouse button to shoot bullets
